name: GASPR
description:
GASPR

The GASPR module will add gas production reactions (MT=203-207) to the PENDF file.
Any existing gas-production sections on the input PENDF file are removed, and the file directory is updated to show the new reactions.
This module can be run anywhere in the PENDF preparation sequence, but as a practical matter it should follow BROADR.
tooltip: Add gas production reactions to the PENDF file.

parameters.name: nendf
parameters.help:
'nendf'

Unit for endf tape. (Needed only for thermal nubar)
